Title: A Hatful of Rain
Writer: Michael V. Gazzo (play), Michael V. Gazzo (screenplay), Alfred Hayes (screenplay), Carl Foreman (screenplay)
Actors: Don Murray, Eva Marie Saint, Anthony Franciosa, Lloyd Nolan
Plot: A Korean War veteran's morphine addiction wreaks havoc upon his family.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 6 wins & 9 nominations.
